headline: Civista Bancshares And 2 Top Dividend Stocks For Your Portfolio
summary: In the current U.S. market landscape, major stock indexes are showing mixed performances amid heightened scrutiny of Federal Reserve actions and record highs in gold and silver prices. As investors navigate this complex environment, dividend stocks like Civista Bancshares offer a potential avenue for stability and income, making them an attractive consideration for those seeking to bolster their portfolios against economic uncertainties.

headline: Regions Financial Scheduled to Participate in Bank of America Securities Financial Services Conference
summary: BIRMINGHAM, Ala., January 12, 2026--Regions Financial Corp. announced the company is scheduled to participate in the Bank of America Securities Financial Services Conference on Feb. 11.
